entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy in the evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
